explanations.machine learning: The paper uses machine learning techniques, specifically the TSA-LSTM model, for predicting cancer incidence and mortality.
explanations.deep learning: The TSA-LSTM model is a deep learning model that utilizes LSTM networks and attention mechanisms.
explanations.neural network: The paper employs neural networks, specifically LSTM networks, as part of the TSA-LSTM model.
explanations.long short-term memory: The paper explicitly mentions the use of LSTM (Long Short-Term Memory) networks in the TSA-LSTM model for time series prediction.
explanations.LSTM: The paper uses LSTM networks as a core component of the TSA-LSTM model for predicting cancer trends.
explanations.attention mechanism: The paper describes a two-stage attention design in the TSA-LSTM model, which includes input feature attention and time performance attention.
